Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- Division B, Town of Lockport
N. LAFX Con., Lev. & Drain.Dist -- 1% S&U Tax - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
North Lafourche Conservation, Levee and Drainage District Proposition
(Sales Tax)

Summary:  Authority for the North Lafourche Conservation, Levee and Drainage District to levy a 1% sales and use tax for 20 years for the purpose of constructing necessary levee, drainage and flood protection projects, including but not limited to constructing and improving pumping stations, command and control solutions, providing for the maintenance and operation of the foregoing and carrying out its authorized purposes, with the proceeds of the tax to be subject to being funded into bonds for any of the aforesaid purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall the North Lafourche Conservation, Levee and Drainage District (the "District"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $8,850,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty (20) years, from and after April 1, 2013, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, with the avails or proceeds of the Tax, after paying costs of collection and administration thereof, to be dedicated and used, for the purpose of constructing necessary levee, drainage and flood protection projects, including but not limited to constructing and improving pumping stations, command and control solutions, providing for the maintenance and operation of the foregoing and carrying out the authorized purposes of the District, with the proceeds of the Tax to be subject to being funded into bonds for any of the aforesaid purposes in accordance with the provisions of Louisiana Law?
